column1: | title=The Lord of the Rings: A Celebration
| image=[[File:The Lord of the Rings A Celebration.jpg|225px]]

'''''The Lord of the Rings: A Celebration''''' is a booklet issued as a supplement to the January 2004 edition of the film magazine ''[[Wikipedia:Empire (film magazine)|Empire]]''. The booklet features portraits and interview excerpts for 27 cast and crew members of [[Peter Jackson]]'s [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]].<ref>{{webcite|author=Brad Sargent|articleurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20120905182512/http://lotrcollectornotes.wordpress.com/empire-celebration/|articlename=Empire 'Celebration' (archived)|dated=5 September 2012|website=LotR Collector Notes|accessed=30 June 2014}}</ref>
*Page 20:  [[Dan Hennah]] – Art Director.  Chris Hennah – Art Co-Ordinator. Wellington
